title: League Screensavers

replies.body: If u can find me an animated Yorick loggin screen i will be happy to make a screensaver for you :)
I have literaly tried every single free flv to swf converter on the first 5 pages of that... they all reduce it to about 7 pixels
Hey None of them seem to have sounds except yasuo(which I get from your previous thread on the forums) is this intended
Could it be possible that you make a championship thresh screensaver? :)
